CustomField.formula: IF (AND(NOT(ISBLANK( CodeLength__c )), EarliestVersion__c != null, NOT(ISBLANK(EarliestVersion__r.CodeLength__c))) , (CodeLength__c / EarliestVersion__r.CodeLength__c ) , null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The percent of code compared to the earliest version we have tracking for.
CustomField.label: Pct From Earliest
